meanings.definition: A person who has a comprehensive and authoritative knowledge in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The expert in the room confidently answered all the difficult questions.
meanings.sent2: The expert chef prepared a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The expert juggler managed to juggle while riding a unicycle!
meanings.sent4: She was an expert at navigating through the busy city streets.
meanings.sent5: The expert astronomer discovered a new comet in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Having, involving, or displaying special skill or knowledge derived from training or experience.
meanings.sent1: The expert mechanic quickly fixed the broken car.
meanings.sent2: She gave an expert presentation on the latest research findings.
meanings.sent3: The expert painter used a toothbrush to create a masterpiece!
meanings.sent4: His expert timing in the race secured him the first-place trophy.
meanings.sent5: The expert advice from the doctor helped the patient recover faster.
